game.name: TS Marketplace: BNSF Scenario Pack 02
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: BNSF Scenario Pack 02 for Train Simulator Classic delivers – in ten new and realistic career scenarios – the challenges and drama of BNSF contemporary railroading on a pair of legendary lines with Santa Fe heritages – the Arizona Divide route and Tehachapi Pass route!
game.shortDescriptionEn: BNSF Scenario Pack 02 for Train Simulator Classic delivers – in ten new and realistic career scenarios – the challenges and drama of BNSF contemporary railroading on a pair of legendary lines with Santa Fe heritages – the Arizona Divide route and Tehachapi Pass route!
